name: smokescreen
effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.
